item.title: Filming Underway on Season 2 of Netflix’s ‘Geek Girl,’ Layton Williams Joins Cast
item.description: Based on Holly Smale’s bestselling novels, the show follows socially awkward but endearing teenager Harriet Manners (Em Carey) as she’s unexpectedly thrust into the fashion world.
